title: (x) "Thinking of You" lowrider/hispanic script - custom {BJ}
content:
looking for this airbrush/hispanic/lowrider script. Any ideas in this lowrider genre would be appreciated.   
 ![HISPANIC SCRIPT](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221822im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28110.jpg)
author: grossfont

comments.content: That doesn't look like a font to me.

That's custom airbrush script, probably done straight in Photoshop   
and made to be "pretend airbrushed".   
   
The entire piece looks like the work of Aztlan, aka Fifth Sun.   
   
 [http://www.aztlangraphics.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221822/http:/www.aztlangraphics.com/)   
   
   
You might look here for some other stuff   
that can get you close.   
 [http://www.artandsignstudio.com/fonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221822/http:/www.artandsignstudio.com/fonts.html)   
 [http://www.signdna.com/v1/originals/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221822/http:/www.signdna.com/v1/originals/)   
   
bj
Karen -- Customized cars with airbrushed paint jobs, chiefly a Hispanic-American art form.
Ah! Thanks! Those cars are called low riders then?

Karen - everything you need to know and then some.   
   
 [http://www.lowrider.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221822/http:/www.lowrider.com/)   
 [http://www.lowridermagazine.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221822/http:/www.lowridermagazine.com/)
Great! I hate it that I have to go sleep just when everyone's awake. ![:-(](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221822im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/sad.gif)

Ha!   
It's rare that I laugh out loud at a pun, Tiffany, but that was great.

In Harlem, USA there is a low rider bicycle club. They make their own bicycles, get them cromed and ride them around to show off. They are cool! I first saw them at the Puerto Rican parade about eight years ago.
